fact_check_explanation_title: The Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation wasn’t kicked out of India
fact_check_explanation_summary: Also, claims that the polio vaccine paralysed thousands of children are based on shaky evidence.

fact_check_explanation_title: Covid-19 study that links deaths to low vitamin D levels is flawed
fact_check_explanation_summary: This study has been removed from the online research library it was published on.

fact_check_explanation_title: Viral illustration shows one type of Covid-19 sampling method
fact_check_explanation_summary: There are different ways to take samples to test someone for Covid-19.

fact_check_explanation_title: This little girl called Alice has not been kidnapped from your area
fact_check_explanation_summary: This is a recurring fake claim.

fact_check_explanation_title: What do we know about Covid-19 inequalities among people from minority ethnic groups?
fact_check_explanation_summary: There are stark inequalities in Covid-19 outcomes in the UK.

fact_check_explanation_title: The Lord’s Prayer is not banned from Facebook
fact_check_explanation_summary: This has never been Facebook’s policy.

fact_check_explanation_title: This was a real petition calling for the White Cliffs of Dover to be renamed
fact_check_explanation_summary: The petition on change.org called for “The Black Lives Matter Cliffs of Dover” but it doesn’t seem to be connected to the BLM UK group.

fact_check_explanation_title: This Facebook post isn’t by tennis player Serena Williams
fact_check_explanation_summary: The post was shared by someone with the same name.

fact_check_explanation_title: There is no evidence that suicides have increased 200% under lockdown
fact_check_explanation_summary: There is no clear source for this figure.

fact_check_explanation_title: The UK has had one of Europe’s worst Covid-19 outbreaks
fact_check_explanation_summary: The UK is not the only European country with many Covid-19 deaths.

fact_check_explanation_title: Bill Gates doesn’t own the vaccine for or patent of the Covid-19 virus
fact_check_explanation_summary: A viral Facebook post claims he is a partner in a Wuhan lab, which he isn’t.

fact_check_explanation_title: Why did few MPs attend a debate on health worker pay?
fact_check_explanation_summary: This was a Petitions Committee debate. These do not lead to any direct decision or vote on changes to law.
